alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 3:59AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duval County through 430 AM CDT... At 359 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Freer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Freer and Rosita. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 774 and 778. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
